Verses: 1 karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Poi, Unakku Oru Sanal Kachchaiyai Vaangi, Adhai Un Araiyile Kattikkol; Adhaith Thanneerile Padavottaadhe Endraar.
2 naan Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Oru Kachchaiyai Vaangi, Adhai En Araiyile Kattikkonden.
3 irandaamvisai Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
4 nee Vaanginadhum Un Araiyilirukkiradhumaana Kachchaiyai Eduththukkondu Ezhundhu, Aippiraaththu Nadhimattum Poi, Adhai Ange Oru Kanmalai Vedippile Oliththuvai Endraar.
5 naan Poi Karththar Enakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Adhai Aippiraaththu Nadhiyin Oraththile Oliththuvaiththen.
6 aneganaal Sendrapinbu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu Aippiraaththu Nadhikkuppoi Ange Oliththuvaikka Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyitta Kachchaiyai Avvidaththilirundhu Eduththukkonduvaa Endraar.
7 appozhudhu Naan Aippiraaththu Nadhikkuppoi, Kachchaiyai Oliththuvaiththa Idaththile Thondi Adhai Eduththen; Aanaal, Idho, Andhak Kachchai Kettu Ondrukkum Udhavaamarpoyitru.
8 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
9 ippadiye Naan Yoodhaavudaiya Perumaiyaiyum, Erusalemudaiya Migundha Perumaiyaiyum Kettuppogappannuven.

10 en Vaarththaigalaik Ketkamaattom Endru Maruththu, Thangal Irudhayaththin Kadinaththinpadi Nadandhu, Anniya Dhevargalai Sevikkavum Avargalaip Panindhukollavum Avargalaip Pinpatrugira Indhap Pollaadha Janangal Ondrukkum Udhavaamarpona Indhak Kachchaiyaippolaavaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

11 kachchaiyaanadhu Manushanudaiya Araikku Serkkaiyaayirukkiradhupola, Naan Isravel Kudumbaththaaranaivaraiyum Yoodhaavin Kudumbaththaaranaivaraiyum, Enakku Janangalaagavum, Keerththiyaagavum, Thudhiyaagavum, Magimaiyaagavum Serkkaiyaakkik Konden; Aanaalum Avargal Sevikodaamarponaargal Endrukarththar Sollugiraar.

12 sagala Jaadigalum Dhraatcharasaththile Nirappappadumendru, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiraar Engira Vaarththaiyai Avargaludane Sol; Adharku Avargal: Sagala Jaadigalum Dhraatcharasaththinaale Nirappappaduvadhu Engalukkuth Theriyaadhaa Endru Unnudane Solluvaargal.

13 appozhudhu Nee Avargalai Nokki: Idho, Indha Dhesaththinkudigalellaaraiyum, Dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththinmel Utkaarndhirukkira Raajaakkalaiyum, Aasaariyargalaiyum, Theerkkadharisigalaiyum, Erusalemin Kudigal Ellaaraiyum Naan Veriyinaal Nirappi,

14 pidhaakkalum Pillaigalumaagiya Avargalai Oruvarmel Oruvar Modhi Vizhumpadippannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Avargalai Azhippadheyandri Mannippadhumillai, Thappaviduvadhumillai Iranguvadhumillaiyendru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
15 neengal Sevikoduththuk Kelungal; Mettimaiyaai Iraadheyungal; Karththar Vilambinaar.

16 avar Andhagaaraththai Varappannuvadharku Munnum, Irunda Malaigalil Ungal Kaalgal Idaruvadharku Munnum Neengal Velichchaththukkuk Kaaththirukkumpodhu, Avar Adhai Andhagaaramum Kaarirulumaaga Maarappannuvadharku Munnum, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Magimaiyai Seluththungal.
17 neengal Idhai Kelaamarponeergalaanaal, En Aaththumaa Maraividangalil Ungal Perumaiyinimiththam Dhukkiththu, Karththarudaiya Mandhai Siraippattupponadhendru En Kan Migavum Azhudhu Kanneer Soriyum.
18 neengal Raajaavaiyum Raajaaththiyaiyum Nokki: Thaazhavandhu Utkaarungal; Ungal Sirasin Singaaramaagiya Ungal Magimaiyin Kireedam Vizhundhadhendru Sollungal.
19 therkilulla Pattanangal Adaikkappattana; Avaigalaith Thirappaar Illai; Yoodhaa Anaiththum Kudivilakkappattuppom; Adhu Samoolamaai Siraippattuppom.
20 ungal Kangalai Ereduththu, Vadakkeyirundhu Varugiravargalai Paarungal; Unakkuk Kodukkappattirundha Mandhaiyum, Un Magimaiyaana Aattukkidaiyum Enge?

21 avar Unnai Visaarikkumpodhu Enna Solluvaai? Avargal Unmel Aadhikkakkaararum Thalaivarumaayirukka, Nee Avargalaip Pazhakkuviththaaye; Karppavadhikkup Prasavavedhanai Undaagumpodhu Undaagum Vedhanaigalaippol Vedhanaigal Unnaip Pidippadhillaiyo?
22 ivaigal Enakku Nerittadhu Edhendru Nee Un Irudhayaththil Sonnaayaagil, Un Thiralaana Akkiramaththinimiththame Un Orangal Vilakkappattu, Un Paadhangal Balavandhancheyyappadugindrana.
23 eththiyoppiyan Than Tholaiyum, Sivingi Than Pulligalaiyum Maatrakkoodumo? Koodumaanaal, Theemaiseyyappazhagina Neengalum Nanmaiseyyakkoodum.
24 aadhalaal Vanaandharak Kaatraal Parakkadikkappadum Thurumbaippola Avargalai Sidharadippen.
25 nee Ennai Marandhu, Poiyai Nambinapadiyinaale, Idhu Unnudaiya Veedhamum, Ennaal Unakku Alakkappadum Unnudaiya Pangumaayirukkum Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
26 un Maanam Kaanappada Naan Un Vasthiraththu Orangalai Mugamattaaga Eduththuppoduven.

27 un Vibasaarangalaiyum, Un Kanaikkudhalgalaiyum, Veliyile Medugalinmel Nee Pannina Vesiththanaththin Muraikedugalaagiya Un Aruvaruppugalaiyum Naan Kanden; Erusaleme, Unakku Aiyo! Nee Suththigarikkappadamaattaayaa? Idhu Innum Eththanai Kaalaththukkuppin Nadakkum? Engiraar.
